plot outline: Sri Anjaneyam is a Telugu film directed and produced by Krishna Vamsi. It stars Arjun Sarja, Nitin, Charmme Kaur in the lead roles. Prakash Raj and Ramya Krishna play supporting roles. This film was dubbed into Tamil as Hanumaan (2004) and into Hindi as My Boss Bajarangbali and also remade in Oriya as Chhati Chiri Dele Tu directed by S.K. Muralidharan starring Anubhav Mohanty & Sidhant Mohapatra.
title: Sri Anjaneyam
plot: _Sri Anjaneyam_ (qv) is a Telugu film directed and produced by Krishna Vamsi. It stars Arjun Sarja, Nitin, Charmme Kaur in the lead roles. Prakash Raj and Ramya Krishna play supporting roles. This film was dubbed into Tamil as Hanumaan (2004) and into Hindi as My Boss Bajarangbali and also remade in Oriya as Chhati Chiri Dele Tu directed by S.K. Muralidharan starring Anubhav Mohanty & Sidhant Mohapatra.
